description: The robot's gripper grasps the Pringles can around its cylindrical body, performing a Power:Large Diameter grasp to handle it.
contact_details: The robot's gripper is grasping the Pringles can around its cylindrical body. The gripper fingers are in contact with the sides of the can, providing a secure hold. The thumb is positioned on one side, and the fingers are on the opposite side, creating a cylindrical grasp.
